pages.text: This realm is known for having a rich abundance of different minerals. This entry documents all of them, their mining level (what tier ores their respective pickaxe can mine), and any special uses they may have.
Gold is often sought after for its high value, but is also conductive and malleable.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 0
Common, versatile, reliable.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 2
Coal is a very common burnable fuel source. Helpful!$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Lapis lazuli is useful as a dye, and also for enchanting.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Diamond... Rare, strong, durable, and iconic!$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level level: 3
Redstone is a curious substance. It conducts a strange form of power, which can be used for many simple mechanisms.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Emerald is a rare ore found in mountainous areas. It is highly valued by villagers.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Quartz is found abundantly in the Nether. It is useful for decoration, and can be smelted into silicon.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: N/A
Rock Crystals are found extremely rarely at very low elevation. It resonates when exposed to the night sky.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 3

Iridium is exceedingly rare in the Overworld, but can be found in larger amounts in the Beneath. Its properties make it incredibly useful for advanced machinery, armor, and tools.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 7
Draconium contains extreme latent energy, but harnessing this energy doesn't seem very easy...$(br) $(br)Location: The End$(br)Mining level: 7
Apatite can be found higher up in the world. It is used to make fertilizer, among other things.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Aluminum is a fairly common, lightweight metal.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 2
Lead is an uncommon, very heavy metal. Useful for radiation protection.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 2
Uranium is fairly rare, used for high end power generation.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Sulfur is somewhat rare. It is used for batteries, thermite, and ore processing$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Potash is an uncommon ore used to make thermite.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Phosphorite is a rare ore used to make lamps.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Alduorite is a fairly rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: N/A
Platinum is a rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 3
Vulcanite is a somewhat rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 6
Tin is a rather common ore. It can be used for low-load power cables.$(br) $(br)Location: Overowlrd$(br)Mining level: N/A
Ignatius is a somewhat common ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 2
Zinc is a common ore. It is mainly used to make brass.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Astral Silver is a very rare ore. It can be turned into starmetal using astral magic.$(br) $(br)Location: The Aether$(br)Mining level: 5
Lemurite is a common ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: N/A
Sanguinite is a rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 7
Eximite is found commonly in the outer end.$(br) $(br)Location: The End$(br)Mining level: 7
Silver is a fairly common, and fairly valuable, metal.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 1
Shadow Iron is a common ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 2
Carmot is an exceedingly rare ore. It has extreme magical power, though a way of harnessing it has yet to be found.$(br) $(br)Location: The Beneath$(br)Mining level: 5
Mithril is a very rare metal that has many applications in magic.$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: 5
Ceruclase is rather rare.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 4
Deep Iron is found commonly in watery areas of the Twilight Forest$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: 3
Kalendrite is somewhat rare.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 5
Manganese is an uncommon metal. It can be used as an alternative way to create steel, though this process is energy-intensive$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Prometheum is found rarely in densely wooded areas of the Twilight Forest.$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: 2
Copper is a rather common and very conductive metal, used in cabling and many other electrical devices.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: 2
Adamantine is found in rare, large 'geodes' in the Aether, surrounded by permafrost.$(br) $(br)Location: The Aether$(br)Mining level: 7
Atlarus is found in rare, large 'geodes' in the Nether, surrounded by brimstone.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 7
Vyroxeres is rather uncommon.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 4
Lutetium is a rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Osmium is a fairly common ore. It is strong and fairly durable, and is used in higher-end machine casings.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Oureclase is a rare ore.$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: 3
Meutoite is found commonly on the central End island. It has mutative properties, making it useful for genetics equipment.$(br) $(br)Location: The End$(br)Mining level: N/A
Orichalcum is very rare.$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: 6
Infuscolium is somewhat rare.$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: N/A
Midasium is an extremely rare ore. It has mild transmutative properties, able to turn most metals into gold by combining dusts.$(br) $(br)Location: The Nether$(br)Mining level: 4

Rubracium is fairly uncommon. It can be used to make gauntlets, which can be dual-wielded. These gauntlets will stun enemies hit while attacking, and will launch them a distance based on how long they were stunned when you stop attacking!$(br) $(br)Location: The Twilight Forest$(br)Mining level: N/A
Cinnabar is an uncommon ore. It has many applications in thaumaturgy.$(br) $(br)Location: The Overworld$(br)Mining level: N/A
Ambrosium is found commonly in the Aether. It can be used to heal, and serves as fuel for the enchanter.$(br) $(br)Location: The Aether$(br)Mining level: N/A

Zanite is a curious, uncommon gemstone. Tools and armor constructed from it become faster and stronger as they wear out. Wearing a ring made from it grants faster mining, but it will wear out over time.$(br) $(br)Location: The Aether$(br)Mining level: 2

Gravitite is rarely found in the Aether. It floats up when there is no block above it. Tools constructed from it can make certain blocks float, and when wearing a full set of the armor (gloves included), you can jump higher.$(br) $(br)Location: The Aether$(br)Mining level: 2
